mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select b.b_id, b.name name, to_char(a.startdate, 'MM/DD') startdate, to_char(a.enddate, 'MM/DD') enddate, a.photo photo, a.link link, a.price price, a.grade grade from ad a join business b on a.b_id=b.b_id)) where rownum<=#{param1} order by startdate asc ) where rownum<=#{param2} order by startdate desc
